title: Gift alert! Give the photographer in your life Luminar Neo for under $200
content:
Macworld

There’s probably someone on your holiday shopping list who’s a certified Instagram creator. Or, there’s an actual aspiring photographer you’re struggling to gift this year. The ideal gift for both? Innovative photo-editing software.

Now, you can get a studio’s worth of tools and some top-rated editing add-ons with the Luminar Neo Lifetime Bundle, now only $199.99 (reg. $752). Got a kiddo photographer who doesn’t need as many features? Luminar Neo Lite is only $49.99 (reg. $273)!

Winner of the 2022 Red Dot for Interface Design, Luminar Neo and Luminar Neo Lite utilize AI to upscale and enhance photos, whether that’s cropping out shadows, enhancing skies, or light skin tone editing. Both work great independently or as a plug-in companion to Photoshop or Lightroom.

Check out some of the features included with Luminar Neo:

  • Panorama Stitching
  • Background removal
  • Supercontrast
  • Composition 
  • And more!

Meanwhile, Luminar Neo Lite offers more basic photo-editing tools, like the ability to replace pixels, erase unnecessary details, or enhance a subject’s skin. With either purchase, users will also get six overlay add-ons to help them capture the exact feel for landscape or portrait photos. Luminar Neo purchases will even get ten tutorial videos!

This holiday, give the gift of AI-powered photo editing.

Through November 12th at 11:59pm Pacific, grab lifetime access to:

  • Luminar Neo and Six Overlays for just $199.99

No coupon required!

 

The Award-Winning Luminar Neo Lifetime Bundle

Starting at $49.99

Prices subject to change.
